A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Half the story was a red herring\, all the questions that were raised by Episode VII were through away or ignored all together. I love Star Wars and after seeing this movie I was so sad. The CGI was beautiful\, Carrie Fisher and Mark Hamill were wonderful. I also really liked the new character Rose. I guess I'm just really disappointed with what they came up with when Episode VII had set up some really interesting and intriguing story lines that have been thrown away.
